title: Fifteen Feet of Time/Cinco metros de tiempo: Bilingual English-Spanish Picture Book (Dual Language/Parallel Text) (Bilingual Books
description: What happens if the world unexpectedly stands still for a moment? If, just like that, you are given a bit of time by sheer luck? This is exactly what happens in one of the biggest and busiest cities of the world, as a small snail crosses the street and makes traffic stop for half a day. A book about things that you always wanted to do but never had the time for.
author: Philipp Winterberg
